articles.author: Guy Faulconbridge
articles.title: Putin issues warning to US with new nuclear doctrine - Reuters
articles.description: The doctrine outlines the threats that would make Russia contemplate using nuclear weapons.

articles.author: Wesley Yin-Poole
articles.title: Report: Sony in Talks to Buy Kadokawa, Owner of Elden Ring and Dark Souls Developer FromSoftware - IGN
articles.description: Sony is reportedly in talks to buy Kadokawa, whose subsidiary FromSoftware is behind smash hit Elden Ring, the Dark Souls and Armored Core games, and PlayStation exclusive Bloodborne.
articles.content:
Sony is reportedly in talks to buy Kadokawa, whose subsidiary FromSoftware is behind smash hit Elden Ring, the Dark Souls and Armored Core games, and PlayStation exclusive Bloodborne.

articles.title: The Game Awards 2024 Nominees Have Been Revealed - Zelda, Mario And Metroid Nominated - Nintendo Life
articles.content:
I thought Helldivers would get nominated for either GOTY or Game Direction over Black Myth Wukong. Id argue Helldivers has better direction than all of the nominees.
